title: 'Leakage'
body: It looks and feels good. But when you're out in the rain, you'd be thinking the double layer will be protecting you. Well, in my case the water some how gets in between the 2 layers of the raincoat and the raincoat inflates with filled water. Plus the zip plus the 2 layers of buttons ain't good enough as my clothes get soaked via the center portion of the raincoat. I'll do fine on a small rain. The state where I live, it rains half of the year. I'd recommend you to get a better raincoat by investing a little more if you're in for a heavy rain because this thing is not gonna survive a heavy rain.

title: 'It is good'
body: I didn't write a review for 1 month after purchase. It really was put to the test as I use my bike every day. The raincoat is as good as new still and going strong. At this price it's a steal. Go for it guys.

title: 'An Essential Rain Gear: Functional
body: '5.0 out of 5 stars'
column5: 'Citizen Real-Reversible Raincoat for Men. is a fantastic choice for those in need of a stylish and practical raincoat. The adjustable hood provides excellent coverage
column6: and the waterproof pant keeps you dry even in heavy rain. The included plastic cap and carry pouch are convenient additions. The lightweight polyester material is durable and comfortable
column7: while the military print adds a unique touch. Highly recommended'

title: 'MORE THAN EXPECTED'
body: This rain coat I purchased on amazon for knowing the quality of this product. It is truly right product for you if you are looking for a Decent raincoat for you and your family. The material is very good than a 1.5 to 2 K raincoat gives. It comes with a hat which you can add or remove as per your choice and a carry bag which is also very good. You may notice that most of the brands were not providing the cap and carry bag even the price of other are usually higher than this one. IF you are looking for a raincoat for daily use in rainy season than you should defentlily go with this it totally a value for money product. And lastly remember one thing which is it's price because the MRP is ‚Çπ999 and it's price were fluctuating everytime so I you get it under ‚Çπ800 then it is totally satisfied your purchase maybe you can buy with the MRP it is also not a bad deal might sometime the price is also depends on the area where it will dilivered so keep this point in your mind. üëçüëç
